name: NSBezierPath.LineCapStyle
desc: Constants that specify the shape of endpoints for an open path when it is stroked.

items.name: case butt
items.desc: Specifies a butt line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.

items.name: case round
items.desc: Specifies a round line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.

items.name: case square
items.desc: Specifies a square line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.
